abilities.name: Crystal Type
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Water, Lightning, or Psychic basic Energy card from your hand to Kingdra, Kingdra's type (color) becomes the same as that Energy card type until the end of the turn.

attacks.name: Aquabomb
attacks.effect: Kingdra does 10 damage to itself. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance when Kingdra damages itself with this attack.)

attacks.name: Dual Burn
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each tails, discard 1 Energy card attached to Kingdra.
